p: The changes in the antioxidative status of EAC cells were monitored by measuring the activity of antioxidative enzymes (XOD, CAT, Px, GSHPx, and GR) and the quantity of GSH and the intensity of LPx in EAC cells. The obtained results were compared with the control group, that is, with the results of measurements of the same parameters in EAC cells ( Table 1).
